snippet: Chiwetel Ejiofor said his first reactions to the “12 Years a Slave” involved caution and self-doubt, partly because of the real Solomon Northup’s legacy, as highlighted in a video of Northup’s descendants.
abstract: Chiwetel Ejiofor said his first reactions to the “12 Years a Slave” involved caution and self-doubt, partly because of the real Solomon Northup’s legacy, as highlighted in a video of Northup’s descendants.

headline.main: Solomon Northup's Legacy, on Film and in Life
